issue.title: [C++] Flesh out union implementation to have all required methods for IPC
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-268](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-268). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current Union implementation just looks like shell implementation we need to add proper implementation for things like equality before we can add it to IPC.
